Course Name: ACG 4123 - INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS III
Course Title: INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS III
Course Description: THE THIRD INTERMEDIATE FINANCIAL REPORTING AND ANALYSIS COURSE DEALS WITH A CONTINUATION OF GAAP AND IFRS HARMONIZATION AS APPLIED TO FINANCIAL REPORTING.  AREAS COVERED INCLUDE INVESTMENTS, REVENUE RECOGNITION, ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES, PENSIONS, LEASES, CASH FLOWS AND FINANCIAL REPORTING DISCLOSURES. THIS COURSE MUST BE COMPLETED AT HODGES UNIVERSITY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
